prompts: Create a dragon-type Pokemon with elegant wings and a sleek body shape.
I want a psychic Pokemon that glows softly in the moonlight, embodying grace.
Generate a mythical creature with a magnificent silhouette and captivating colors.
Make a legendary Pokemon that soars above the clouds with a gentle demeanor.
Imagine a Pokemon that embodies tranquility and wisdom, with soothing hues.
Design a Pokemon that blends seamlessly with the lush environments of forests.
Give me a flying-type Pokemon that can adapt to various terrains effortlessly.
